message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. This is a great opportunity to get a fantastic deal, and I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit too pricey. I'd like to make a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to sell it to you for $900000. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1100000. This is still a great deal, and I believe the product's value will only increase over time. I'm open to further negotiations, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for my product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $950000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and the value I'll get from using the product. I'm open to further negotiations, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $950000. I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $1050000. This is still a great deal, and I believe the product's value will only increase over time. I'm open to further negotiations, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for my product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand that you're still looking for a fair price, but I'm not willing to go above $1000000. I'm willing to make a final offer of $990000 for the product. This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $990000. I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $1050000. This is still a great deal, and I believe the product's value will only increase over time. I'm open to further negotiations, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for my product.
